title: 784-B
statement: B. Kids' Riddletime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test64 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputProgrammers' kids solve this riddle in 5-10 minutes. How fast can you do it?InputThe input contains a single integern(0 ≤n≤ 2000000000).OutputOutput a single integer.ExamplesInput11Output2Input14Output0Input61441Output2Input571576Output10Input2128506Output3
